name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Muddle sugar and bitters with a splash of water (if using cube). Add whiskey and ice. Stir gently.

name: Margarita
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a salt-rimmed glass over fresh ice.

name: Cosmopolitan
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint with lime juice and syrup. Add rum and ice. Top with club soda and stir lightly.

name: Espresso Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients vigorously with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

name: French 75
instructions: Shake gin, lemon, and syrup with ice. Strain into a flute and top with Champagne.

name: Mai Tai
instructions: Shake all but dark rum with ice. Strain over fresh ice and float the dark rum on top.

name: Negroni
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a rocks glass over ice.

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients without ice (if using egg white), then shake again with ice. Strain into a glass.

name: Paloma
instructions: Build in a glass over ice. Stir gently and top with grapefruit soda.

name: Cape Codder
instructions: Build in a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently and garnish with lime.

name: Greyhound
instructions: Build in a highball glass over ice. Stir and serve.

name: Salty Dog
instructions: Rim the glass with salt. Build drink in glass over ice and stir.

name: Vodka Tonic
instructions: Build in a highball glass over ice. Garnish with lime.

name: Moscow Mule
instructions: Build in a copper mug with ice. Stir and garnish with lime.

name: White Russian
instructions: Build in an old fashioned glass with ice. Float cream on top and stir gently.

name: Vodka Collins
instructions: Shake vodka, lemon juice, and syrup with ice. Strain into a Collins glass and top with soda water.

name: Vodka Gimlet
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Vodka Martini
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Dirty Martini
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with olives.

name: Tequila Sunrise
instructions: Pour tequila and orange juice into a highball glass with ice. Slowly pour grenadine to create a sunrise effect.

name: Classic Margarita
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a salt-rimmed glass filled with fresh ice.

name: Strawberry Margarita
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass filled with fresh ice.

name: Cadillac Margarita
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a salt-rimmed glass filled with fresh ice.

name: Frozen Margarita
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth and pour into a salt-rimmed glass.
